task.summary: Default task
Finish implementation of npc.places.find_plotmarkers. Small code refactor.
Add plotmarker search to adapt_mg_villages_plotmarker (WIP) Small code cleanup.
Finish implementation to find nearby plotmarkers.

Spawner: Nearby plotmarkers are now scanned for all mg_villages:plotmarkers. Places: Usable nodes now include workplaces Small bug fixes. Relationships: Small bugfix with gift item response. Occupations: Add work node descriptions. Experimental "priest" occupation.

Add workplaces support. Places: Workplaces are now usable nodes. Plotmarkers around a building can be scanned and their information stored into current plotmarker. Slightly optimize plotmarker search. Occupations: Add test "priest" occupation definition. Fix lots of bugs in initialization code. Spawner: Add ability to determine occupation name out of surrounding workplaces. Assign occupation to spawned NPC using simple algorithm. Others: Reduce log noise a bit. Fix some warnings.
Add priest texture (WIP)
Small bug fixes and log cleanups.
Change names to match convention.
Add occupation name to entity properties.

Spawner: Workplaces are properly assigned to NPC. If a workplace is assigned to a NPC, it is not used by any other NPC. "/restore_plotmarkers" command also restores the workplace so it can be used by other NPCs. Occupations: Dialogues are registered on occupation registration.
Dialogues: Fix bug when not having custom trade offers.
Actions: Fix bug and add support for using access node.
Spawner: Add workplaces properly to the usable nodes.
Schedules: Add support to change flags in schedules.
Priest occupation (WIP)
Fix bug with dialogues being cleared for NPCs on occupation init.
Spawner: Fix issue when "npcs" table is not present in restore_plotmarkers.

Occupation: Add ability to set some of the NPCs properties. Currently, you can set: - Trader status - Whether to show or hide gift items hints NPC: Add enable/disable gift item hints flag Schedules: Allow to set the enable/disable gift item hints flag Dialogues: Add ability to choose from normal dialogues if hint dialogues are disabled.
Occupations: Refactor all occupation defs into separate Lua files. Add WIP priest occupation. Add WIP (very WIP) farmer occupation.
Actions: Fix bugs and improve dig and place action commands.
Actions: Add mine animation to dig/place actions. Fix bug enabling wandering after dig action. Improved "random" dir functionality for walk_step to avoid getting NPC stuck. General formatting fixes.
Log cleanup.

Actions: Fix bugs in dig and place actions. Fix bug in get_pos_argument() function. Optimize walk_to_pos task and improve usage of access node. Improve get_direction() by using vector.direction() and vector.round()
Pathfinder: Fix indentation. Improve path decorator to avoid jumping NPCs (in Minetest 0.5-dev)
Update building_type definitions.
Default Priest: Change building type definitions to new format.
Default Farmer (WIP): Improve schedule entries, schedule check. Change to new building type format.

Occupations: Change building type format to be more flexible. Spawner: Huge rework on logic to determine occupations. Warning! Completely incomprehensible code. Schedule: Improve schedule check enqueue and execution. Optimize walk_to_pos if used on distances < 3 Huge amounts of log cleanup. Places: Improve adding shared places. Improve orthogonal node scanning by using walkables and not one single node.
Spawner: Fix typo
Spawner: Fix undefined node
Actions: Add sounds to dig/place actions.
Farmer: Add other schedule entries for commonplace tasks. Priest: Fixed missing dialogue issue. Miner: Fixed indentation.
Default occupation: Perform casual trading during afternoon, none during the rest of the day.
Actions: Fix bug with not finding walkable positions around bed.
Log cleanup.
Schedules: Allow to set trade list as a schedule property. Trade: Trading list now supports setting maximum sell count, buy count and how much to keep (in case of sell). Add price for empty bucket.
Trade: Fix name for stone hoe.
Farmer: Add trading list. Add 6 cotton seeds as initial inventory.
Spawner: Add search radius and height to manual spawn egg.
Fixed bugs related to door positioning, opening/closing, and finding positions in general.

Places: Allow finding alternative nodes when nodes are being used. Add owned and used properties to each owned/shared node. Actions: Allow to find alternative sittable/bed/furnace node if currently being used. Default occupation: Add alternative sitting finding. NPC: Log cleanup.
Add move states to avoid laying/sitting bug (WIP)
NPC: Fix issues with female and male skins. Fix naming issues with male skins. Improve coloring on male skins.

NPC: Fix animation state not persistent on interaction/game restart. Action lock/unlock doesn't perform lock if movement state is sitting or laying. Right-click interaction can now be disabled in freeze action command. Upon NPC activation, animation is restored.
NPC: Use `after_activate()` callback to fix animation issue.
NPC: After interacting with NPC, original yaw is restored.
NPC: Support backward compatibility.
NPC: Add execution context.

MESSAGE.value: Default Priest: Change building type definitions to new format.
Default Farmer (WIP): Improve schedule entries, schedule check. Change to new building type format.

Occupations: Change building type format to be more flexible. Spawner: Huge rework on logic to determine occupations. Warning! Completely incomprehensible code. Schedule: Improve schedule check enqueue and execution. Optimize walk_to_pos if used on distances < 3 Huge amounts of log cleanup. Places: Improve adding shared places. Improve orthogonal node scanning by using walkables and not one single node.
Spawner: Fix typo
Spawner: Fix undefined node
Actions: Add sounds to dig/place actions.

Schedule: Check function now are able to prefer last node acted upon. Spawner: Added ability to reset workplace marker and set as surrounding building. (WIP) Places: Support manually placed surrounding buildings. Occupations: Support override of maximum dialogue count. Relationships: Fix bug with gift item reactions. NPC: Add wrapper function over minetest.add_particle_spawner()
Farmer: Add other schedule entries for commonplace tasks. Priest: Fixed missing dialogue issue. Miner: Fixed indentation.
Default occupation: Perform casual trading during afternoon, none during the rest of the day.
Actions: Fix bug with not finding walkable positions around bed.
Log cleanup.
Schedules: Allow to set trade list as a schedule property. Trade: Trading list now supports setting maximum sell count, buy count and how much to keep (in case of sell). Add price for empty bucket.
Trade: Fix name for stone hoe.
Farmer: Add trading list. Add 6 cotton seeds as initial inventory.
Spawner: Add search radius and height to manual spawn egg.
Fixed bugs related to door positioning, opening/closing, and finding positions in general.

Places: Allow finding alternative nodes when nodes are being used. Add owned and used properties to each owned/shared node. Actions: Allow to find alternative sittable/bed/furnace node if currently being used. Default occupation: Add alternative sitting finding. NPC: Log cleanup.

Places: Add truly owned nodes. NPCs shouldn't override ownership anymore. Spawner: Add command "/restore_area" to clear up node ownership & usage in manually spawned places. "/restore_plotmarkers" now clean up node ownership & usage in mg_villages.
Add move states to avoid laying/sitting bug (WIP)
NPC: Fix issues with female and male skins. Fix naming issues with male skins. Improve coloring on male skins.

NPC: Fix animation state not persistent on interaction/game restart. Action lock/unlock doesn't perform lock if movement state is sitting or laying. Right-click interaction can now be disabled in freeze action command. Upon NPC activation, animation is restored.
NPC: Use `after_activate()` callback to fix animation issue.
NPC: After interacting with NPC, original yaw is restored.
NPC: Support backward compatibility.
NPC: Add execution context.
